Impact of Agriculture Each civilization scores culture equal to the amount of food its farms produce. Orange scores 6 culture Purple scores 6 culture Green scores 10 culture Grey scores 5 culture
Impact of Colonies Each civilization scores 4 culture per colony. Orange scores 0 culture Purple scores 12 culture Green scores 16 culture Grey scores 8 culture
Impact of Architecture Each civilization scores 1 culture per level of its urban buildings. Orange scores 2 culture Purple scores 16 culture Green scores 14 culture Grey scores 11 culture

Impact of Progress Each civilization scores 2 culture per level of each of its government and special (blue) technologies. Orange scores 12 culture Purple scores 18 culture Green scores 12 culture Grey scores 24 culture
